ComicInfo.Summary: The Hate of the Harpy!: M.O.D.O.K. exposes Betty to a heavy dose of gamma radiation and turns her into the Harpy. Lashing out at the jade giant for having a hand in her husband's death, the Harpy takes down the Hulk by playing on his sympathies and then blasting him. Meanwhile, officials at the Pentagon relieve Thunderbolt Ross of his duties and place Colonel Armbruster in charge of Project Greenskin.
ComicInfo.Tags: Hulkbusters,Hulk,New York State,Talia,New York City,M.O.D.O.K.,Manhattan,Betty Ross,A.I.M.,Jim Wilson,Thunderbolt Ross
